name: Alabama Worley
description: The smoked honey is the star ingredient in this cocktail from Brian Block of Aldea in NYC, adding a nice dark counterpoint to the subtle peach flavors.
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ ounce Death’s Door White Whiskey

recipeInstructions.text: For the smoked honey: prepare stovetop smoker with wood chips. Mix honey with water until dissolved, place in shallow pan over wood chips and cover with lid. Place smoker on heat source according to manufacturer directions and allow honey mixture to sit with smoke for 30 minutes.
For the cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add white whiskey, Matilde peche, smoked honey, lemon juice, and bitters. Shake well and strain into ice-filled glass. Garnish with sprig of mint.
